attributes.action: Vaccines for healthy adults under 50 to be directed to countries most affected.
attributes.additional_details: The risk to the elderly and those with underlying conditions in other countries is higher than the under 50s with no underlying conditions in the UK.
attributes.background: Vaccine supplies for all non critical, non vulnerable, under 50s should be redirected to a global pool and shared with countries most affected for their vulnerable or at risk population.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572802
